// golfing Txoka's 889 chars shader https://shadertoy.com/view/MsXBRX

#define T - texture( iChannel0, U - iTime*vec2//
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = u / R,
         B = T(.5,.2) T(1,.5) ).xy/32. ).xy,
         M = U+B - .5 - sin(1.+U*U*.1).y * B;
    R = abs( M*.17*R/R.y - M.y );
    O = R.x < .37 ? texture(iChannel1, U+B )
                  : texture(iChannel2, R.x < .47 ? M + .5 : U ); }  /*      



                    
                    
                    
                    
//   // 254 chars    

#define T texture(iChannel0, U - iTime*vec2(

#define mainImage(O,u)                            \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,                      \
         U = u / R,                               \
         B = T .5,.2)- T 1 ,.5)).xy/32. ).xy,     \
         M = U-B + sin(1.+U.y*U.y*.1) *1.03* B,   \
         p = ( M -.5 ) *R/R.y;                    \
    float  x =  abs( p.x*.17-p.y ) ;              \
    O = x < .37 ? texture(iChannel1, U-B )        \
                : texture(iChannel2, x < .47 ? M : U )  /*

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
